description: --- datasets: - glue - multi_nli - tals/vitaminc --- # Details Model used in Get Your Vitamin C! Robust Fact Verification with Contrastive Evidence (Schuster et al., NAACL 21`). For more details see: When using this model, please cite the paper. # BibTeX entry and citation info
model_explanation_gemini: Classifies or verifies facts by leveraging contrastive evidence, trained on datasets including GLUE, MultiNLI, and VitaminC.
